Νῶε
(as LXX, FlJ, who also gives Νώεος, Νῶχος), ὁ, indecl. (Heb. נֹחַ)
Noah: Mat.24:37-38, Luk.3:36 17:26-27 Heb.11:7, 1Pe.3:20, 2Pe.2:5.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.5.29;
son of: Lamech (H3929H);
father of: Shem (H8035), Ham (H2526) and Japheth (H3315)
§ Noah, "rest, comfort"
Noah, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 24:37ff; Lk. 3:36; 17:26f.; Heb. 11:7; 1Pet. 3:20; 2Pet. 2:25*
